working.currentTask: Install crawl4ai and create /crawl command with auth support

currentContext.content: User wants web scraping tool that can log into accounts and extract specific information using natural language. Save to Tools folder or create /crawl command.

patterns.solution: Use incremental approach: implement functions, add CLI commands, test, document. Phases: 1) Git channels, checkpoints, file cache; 2) BM25 hybrid search; 3) AST code chunking; 4) Context budgeting
